name: Meatnado
desc: A rather popular meat dish Bacon and other garnishes are placed over thin slices of meat, which are then rolled up and pan-fried until browned, then simmered in a broth. When the finished dish is cut open, the meat slices stay tightly wrapped around the filling, just like a tornado.

value.text: Restore 20 Stamina after any party member defeats an opponent. This effect can be triggered once every 3s. Lasts 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

customize.name: Recipe: Meatnado
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Meatnado.

customize.name: Delicious Meatnado
customize.desc: A rather popular meat dish The rich meat fragrance sweeps through you, body and soul, satisfying what your imagination envisions for bountiful meat. No wonder, then, that this dish often finds itself a place at any joyous gathering.

customize.name: Suspicious Meatnado
customize.desc: A rather popular meat dish At first, things were going well enough, but at the final, crucial moment, the rolled meat suddenly fell apart, causing the meat and side dishes to look like the aftermath of a wild storm...

customize.name: Meatnado
customize.desc: A rather popular meat dish Bacon and other garnishes are placed over thin slices of meat, which are then rolled up and pan-fried until browned, then simmered in a broth. When the finished dish is cut open, the meat slices stay tightly wrapped around the filling, just like a tornado.

customize.name: Raw Meat
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

customize.name: Bacon
customize.desc: Smoked strips of pork. Crispy with a bit of fat, but not too greasy. Mmmmm... bacon.

customize.name: Potato
customize.desc: A chunky vegetable. A gift from the earth that you never tire of with its multitude of cooking methods.

customize.name: Onion
customize.desc: A spherical vegetable. As vengeance for cutting it, it will make you cry, no matter how brave you are.
